SafeVote 0.9
  • Reference

    Test the sensitivity of a result to tactical voting.

    test.additions.Rd

    Ballots are added until the ranking changes, or until a specified number of ballots (`alimit`) have been deleted. A simple tactic of "plumping" is used, if a `favoured` candidate is specified. Alternatively, a `tacticalBallot` may be specified.

    test.additions(
  votes,
  alimit = NULL,
  ainc = NULL,
  favoured = NULL,
  tacticalBallot = NULL,
  rankMethod = "SafeRank",
  countMethod = "stv",
  countArgs = NULL
)

    Arguments

    votes

    A set of ballots

    alimit

    Maximum number of plumping ballots to add

    ainc

    Number of ballots to be added in each step

    favoured

    Name of the candidate being "plumped". If NULL, a random candidate is selected from among the candidates not initially top-ranked. All other candidates are ranked #2. An integer value for 'favoured' is interpreted as an index into the candidate names.

    tacticalBallot

    A ballot paper i.e. a vector of length ncol(ballots). If this argument is non-null, it takes precedence over 'favoured' when the ballot box is being stuffed.

    rankMethod

    Name of a ranking attribute in the output of countMethod

    countMethod

    The name of a function which will count the ballots

    countArgs

    List of args to be passed to countMethod (in addition to votes)

    Value

    Number of plumping ballots required for the tactical ballot (if any) to affect the ranking, or for the favoured candidate to move up in the ranking; or zero, if the termination condition has been reached without the tactical voting (if any) having affected the ranking or the ranking of the favoured candidate (if any) having improved. The results of the final ballot count are attached as an attribute "finalResults".

    Examples

    {
data(food_election)
test.additions(food_election, countMethod="condorcet", alimit=10)
test.additions(food_election, favoured=1, countArgs=list(nseats=10))
test.additions(food_election, tacticalBallot=c(1,2,3,4,5), alimit=5)
}
